abt1: I'm a second-year student, studying mathematics and how it relates to program efficency. I love coding and designing programs.
abt2: I have challenged myself by taking difficult classes since being enrolled at UW. I have years of experience collaborating and explaining my ideas from tutoring and volunteering.
con1: I'm looking for industry experience and other opportunites to implement programs. You can check out my personal projects or reach me by email at rinareimer616@gmail.com.

work2-company: Diablo Day Camp
work2-desc:
• Volunteered for 6 years as a Counselor in Training, growing into a senior leadership role.
  • Led daily meetings to plan and execute camp-wide activities.
  • Organized and led sessions to create long-lasting digital presentations on camp skills.
  • Guided younger trainers on effective leadership.
  • Personally requested to return annually due to demonstrated leadership and camper engagement skills.
  • Continued to organize and lead camp by returning as a counselor, planning activities and meals for the camp session.
